response.overview: An interactive fantasy-adventure short based on Ian Livingstone's multi-million selling classic gamebook. The viewer assumes the role of an intrepid Adventurer, as she battles her way through the fabled Deathtrap Dungeon - negotiating perils that challenge her physically and intellectually, with her life hanging in the balance with every choice you make.
response.title: Deathtrap Dungeon: The Golden Room
